settings.text:
QUALITY NUTRIENTS GIVES YOU A QUALITY LIFE
...WHAT ARE YOU PUTTING IN?

Makers of the original powder vitamin in the early 1990’s has gone on to fuel Olympic and Professional athletes to greatness.

With a Family Safe Promise, our fresh raw nutrients are beneficial for all ages. Get the most out of your life with Sport Formula 99. We have a complete line of essential nutrients to help you sleep better, wake up more rested, stay energized throughout the whole day by digesting and processing more of the food you eat.

Make 30% more protein into muscle and metabolize 30% more calories into energy, instead of body fat. Stay focused, feel good and grounded. Be the best you can be.

settings.text:
WELCOME

You now have access to the same supplements that countless TOP athletes have used to win championships with.

1) Watch the video here to learn what makes a good supplement. You will discover why RAW nutrients are the key to your success.

2) Be sure to get a bundle such as the Ultimate Bundle, and use your ONE TIME curtesy coupon code. This code gives you access to everything for the same cost it takes to produce the supplements. You can cancel anything in your bundle that you don't want to keep on a subscription.

3) Again, we suggest that you get the ultimate bundle on a subscription and use the coupon code TEAM50. This will discount everything to 50% off and you will have free shipping.

Remember, you can take off any item you don't want to be shipped a second time by canceling the items in your customer portal.

All subscriptions turn into 25% off and you get free shipping.

AT LAST...A PROTEIN POWDER THAT DOESN’T FEEL LIKE YOU’RE DRINKING DIRT OR CHALK.
Unlike traditional proteins like soy and whey that leave you feeling bloated, our Sport Formula Chickpea Protein Powder delivers a whopping 21 grams of protein with only 2 net carbs. Add it to our organic greens for convenient delicious meal replacement or combine it with your exercise regimen. Sport Formula Chickpea protein powder is flavored with 8 grams of cacao for a rich sumptuous flavor that is pleasant to drink and is not chalky like other protein powders.

settings.title: Pro Athlete endorsed
settings.desc: Don’t be fooled, our exact same nutrients that have fueled Olympic Athletes to achieve Gold Medals is exactly what every human body needs to be healthy.

settings.title: FAMILY SAFE PROMISE
settings.desc: The founder and formulator won’t make any product that he can’t give to his pregnant wife and kids.

settings.title: MADE IN THE USA
settings.desc: Start to finish, Made is U.S.A. US pharmaceutical grade. No compromise, NOT from China like other products use….

settings.title: WADA COMPLIANT
settings.desc: Sport Formula is World Anti-Doping Agency compliant. All of our products are free from any banned substances across all leagues any levels.

settings.title: energy. strength. recovery
settings.subtitle_1: Radiate with passion and energy using a simple daily dose of Sport Formula and start feeling the results right away.
settings.subtitle_2: Whether you’re a pro athlete or work a 9-5, we all feel better when we have more energy.  For that reason, the Sport Formula line of products is designed to give you energy, strength and recovery.
settings.subtitle_3: Start by taking a daily dose of the powder multivitamin to begin your day.  The result? A healthier version of you.

settings.question: HOW OFTEN SHOULD I TAKE IT?
settings.answer: Once daily for health, in order to supplement the poor quality of foods available today and complete your body chemistry. However, on the days that you know you are going to exercise, wait to take it just prior to enhance your stamina and strength. Also, the days that you compete, you may take it just before and during an event, for instance; if you are a Triathlete, you would want to take Sport Formula before each leg of the race to enhance carb assimilations and recovery during the race.

settings.question: ARE THERE STIMULANTS IN SPORT FORMULA?
settings.answer: NO, there is not. Sport Formula is made up of pure live nutrients like raw fruits and vegetables and nothing else. No additives, preservatives or stimulants. Our products are completely VEGAN and pure of all pollutants found in today’s foods.

settings.question: IF I'M NOT SATISFIED, CAN I GET MY MONEY BACK?
settings.answer: 100%. We stand by our products, their taste, and their benefits. If you’re unhappy, let us know. We’ll reimburse you and work to fix the problem.

settings.question: IS IT SAFE FOR EVERYONE?
settings.answer: Yes. All of our products are WADA compliant. The line up has been consumed by Olympic athletes and children alike since 1999.

settings.question: HOW DOES MY SUBSCRIPTION WORK?
settings.answer: Your subscription is in your control. You can delay, or cancel your order anytime from your account page. We only want to ship what you need.

settings.name: Paul Pugliesi
settings.title: Four-time US Surfing Champion Paul Pugliesi
settings.testimonial: Since when did healthy supplements actually taste good? There’s no product line on the market that is as clean and pure as Sport Formula. Everything is made using cold press so you can feel them start to work right away. Not to mentioned the flavors taste amazing!

settings.question: WHAT IS YOUR RETURN POLICY IF IT DOES NOT WORK FOR ME?
settings.answer: 100% satisfaction guarantee. If you are not happy, we are not happy. Let us know and we will issue you a refund or flavor exchange.

settings.question: HOW SHOULD I TAKE THE POWDER MULTIVITAMIN? WATER OR JUICE?
settings.answer:
Taken with food, you will assimilate more carbs fats and proteins.
Taken before workout, you will have more stamina.
Take up to 3 times a day if you are recovering from surgery or fatigue.
Add to 8 ounces of water or pour directly under your tongue, let melt and then swallow.
TIP: when the powder is in your mouth, breath through your nose.

settings.question: I AM A FEMALE, HOW MUCH OF THE MULTIVITAMIN SHOULD I TAKE?
settings.answer:
Male or female, we recommend at least one adult serving per day - 1 packet, or scoop.

Taken with food, you will assimilate more carbs fats and proteins.
Taken before workout, you will have more stamina.
Take up to 3 times a day if you are recovering from surgery or fatigue.
Add to 8 ounces of water or pour directly under your tongue, let melt and then swallow.
TIP: when the powder is in your mouth, breath through your nose.

settings.question: WHEN SHOULD I TAKE SPORT FORMULA?
settings.answer: Once daily for health, in order to supplement the poor quality of foods available today and complete your body chemistry. However, on the days that you know you are going to exercise, wait to take it just prior to enhance your stamina and strength. Also, the days that you compete, you may take it just before and during an event, for instance; if you are a Triathlete, you would want to take Sport Formula before each leg of the race to enhance carb assimilations and recovery during the race.

settings.question: HOW DOES SPORT FORMULA GIVE YOU ENERGY?
settings.answer: There are a few ways that Sport Formula helps you: Sport Formula is not a source of energy by itself, but live vitamins (like the ones found in Sport Formula) are essential for the body to convert carbohydrates and fats into energy therefore enhancing carb and stored fat conversion for more energy. When your body chemistry is complete, you sleep better at night and this is when your body experiences the most recovery from fatigue. Live vitamins are also essential for the body to convert proteins into new healthy cells like muscles, tendons, joints and the cardiovascular system etc. (If you sleep better, you will recover more from fatigue and therefore you won’t get as tired during the next day.) B vitamins and especially B-3 (Niacin) and Arginine, allow the blood flow to circulate easier through the cardiovascular system for enhanced oxygen delivery for more stamina and mental focus. Direct delivery to the blood stream allows the unaltered live nutrients to positively affect the body’s performance for that competitive edge when dissolved under the tongue just minutes prior to strenuous activity.

settings.question: ARE THERE STIMULANTS IN SPORT FORMULA?
settings.answer: NO, there is not. Sport Formula is made up of pure live nutrients like raw fruits and vegetables and nothing else. No additives, preservatives or stimulants. Our vitamin powder is completely VEGAN and pure of all pollutants found in today’s foods.

settings.question: WHAT IS THE BEST WAY TO TAKE SPORT FORMULA?
settings.answer: Sport Formula is best taken sublingual, that means that you let it melt under your tongue. Please breathe through your nose while the powder is in your mouth so you don't accidentally inhale the powder in your mouth and choke and spit it out onto your shirt. So you have been warned, please be careful and breathe through your nose. When the powder is melting it also absorbed through the membrane in your mouth going directly to your bloodstream allowing the vitamin B12 methylcobalamin to absorb fully. This allows Direct Delivery to the bloodstream making you feel the effects of the raw nutrients within minutes. Or, you can add Sport Formula to water or any drink or even your food. Sport Formula absorbs 100% either way to the bloodstream, nothing is wasted like a compressed tablet would be.

settings.question: WHAT IS SPORT FORMULA?
settings.answer: Sport Formula is cold processed, live nutrients like raw vegetables. Sport Formula consists of multi-vitamins, minerals, digestive enzymes and amino acids. It is powder that you can mix with water or consume without water. It is everything missing in food today.

settings.question: HOW OFTEN SHOULD I TAKE SPORT FORMULA?
settings.answer:
You should take Sport Formula everyday to supplement the poor quality of foods and complete your body chemistry allowing you to recover fully from fatigue. However, you can take Sport Formula up to three times per day if you want to enhance benefits from fatigued Or anytime you want a boost of energy and mental focus.
Examples of why you might take Sport Formula up more often:
Example 1: If you are recovering from surgery you would want to take small amounts all day long of these vital nutrients so you could heal quicker just like if you were hooked up to an IV in the hospital. By making the nutrients available to the bloodstream, your body would have building blocks ready to use to heal quicker.
Example 2: If you are a professional athlete and you reach high levels of fatigue from training hard you would want to take it several times a day to enhance your recovery process.
Example 3: If you are an athlete and you are going to compete, you would take Sport Formula right before competition. Once you are accustomed to the formula, you could take two or three servings at one time if your body allows you to. There is a possibility that you could feel warm and tingly from the niacin B3 which enhances blood circulation to the surface of the skin. experimenting with this during practice would be best so as not to interrupt a competition with itchy skin.
Example 4: If you feel like you are getting sick and a cold is coming on, you could take three servings at one time to knock it out before it starts. as stated above, you may feel warm and tingly and have itchy red skin from the niacin B3 which enhances blood circulation to the skin. so do not be alarmed, the feeling passes in about 20 minutes. In my opinion, it's better to feel itchy a little bit and not get sick.
Example 5: You work hard all day long and you don't want to keep taking Red Bull or energy drinks, you should take Sport Formula and add it to water and drink it several times throughout the course of the day to maintain a healthy energy level without stimulants.
Note: Sport Formula is good for you every time you take it. You actually do something good for your body. Amino acids are building blocks, the vitamins control your metabolism andI enhance blood circulation and remove toxins. There are no stimulants so it is helpful each time you take it.

settings.question: IS IT NORMAL TO FEEL WARM, TINGLY, ITCHY OR EVEN TURN RED AFTER TAKING SPORT FORMULA THE FIRST TIME?
settings.answer: If this happened, DO NOT BE ALARMED. The feeling will pass in 20 minutes or so. This just means its working… Sorry if this caught you by surprise, Sport Formula is highly potent and strong because it dissolves 100%. You may need to get used to it for a while, unlike a pill that does nothing because it never dissolves. About 1 person in 100 will have a strong reaction to Vitamin B-3 Niacin and be caught by surprise, even though it is mentioned on the packet. This is a normal reaction to this beneficial nutrient that will affect some people that try it for the first couple of times. You may feel a strong sensation on the skin, for about 20 minutes; due to Vitamin B-3 (Niacin) which increases blood circulation to the surface of your skin, if you are not accustomed to it. We apologize if this has happened to you and you have felt the least bit uncomfortable. Please take half servings for the next few days until your body can adjust properly and then start taking more until you are taking full servings again.

settings.question: WHAT IS THE BEST TIME TO TAKE SPORT FORMULA?
settings.answer: The best time to take Sport Formula is daily at a minimum. Morning is a good time or anytime is good to take Sport Formula. Before mental or physical activity is best for enhanced focus and stamina. Sport Formula can be taken with or without food depending on your stomach. If you are feeling sluggish we're tired, you should take Sport Formula. It is good for you and will pep you up without any stimulant.

settings.question: HOW MANY CALORIES ARE IN SPORT FORMULA?
settings.answer: There 2 calories in Fruit Punch sweetened with Xylitol (natural from fruit) and there are 7 calories in Orange flavor sweetened with Fructose (natural from fruit). Xylitol is said to have several health benefits for your mouth including strengthening your teeth and fighting bad breath. There are zero calories in Sport Formula Gelatin Capsule Form.

settings.question: WHAT KIND OF FLAVORING IS USED?
settings.answer: Natural Orange flavor from actual oranges. And the Fruit Punch flavor is from natural fruits.

settings.question: IS SPORT FORMULA SAFE FOR CHILDREN?
settings.answer: Sport Formula is definitely safe for children, they just take less. The smaller the child, the less that they take. For instance, a small child under 6 would take a quarter of an adult serving. a child over 6 to 12 would take up to half of one adult serving. A child over 12 can take a whole serving if they don't get itchy and red from the niacin B3. Sport Formula contains vital nutrients that are desperately needed buy children while they're developing their bones and ligaments and tissues. Food does not contain everything your child needs. You must supplement somehow. We recommend that you use Sport Formula 100% so that your child can develop to his or her full potential. a lack of nutrients during the development cycle of a child will result in a smaller undeveloped child. There are other malnutrition problems that can develop and lead to other problems in their future.

settings.question: WILL SPORT FORMULA UPSET MY STOMACH?
settings.answer: Sport Formula should not upset your stomach. But if you have a stomach ulcer, it can irritate that and in that case you would want to take it when you eat. Ff Sport Formula irritates your stomach, that is a good indication another problem with your stomach, and probably not the Sport Formula.

settings.question: WILL SPORT FORMULA KEEP ME UP AT NIGHT
settings.answer: This is a good question and fascinating at the same time. It seems like half of our clients that take Sport Formula directly before bed will get the best night sleep ever. And the other half of our clients that take it directly before bed will not be able to sleep. You will not know if it helps you sleep or stay awake until you try it. So unless you are prepared to stay up all night you may not want to experiment with this. On the other hand, you may want to get the best night sleep ever and start trying Sport Formula before bedtime immediately. The tip here is to take it at the last moment before you go to bed.

settings.question: SHOULD I TAKE OTHER PRODUCTS TO BOOST SPORT FORMULA?
settings.answer: This is also a good question. But it is backwards if you ask my opinion. because Sport Formula is the raw nutrients you need to process other nutrients, you would want to take Sport Formula to enhance other supplements and foods that you take. For instance, if you take Sport Formula with protein powder, you will process approximately 30% more protein into muscle instead of wasting it. The same goes with a fat burner, if you take Sport Formula with a metabolism booster you will burn approximately 30% more fat with Sport Formula and the metabolism booster.

settings.question: CAN I KEEP IT IN A FRIDGE?
settings.answer: It is not advisable to keep Sport Formula in the refrigerator. That will create condensation which will negatively affect the powder by making it Clump together. It is advisable to store Sport Formula at room temperature and not in direct sunlight. A cool dry place is most advisable.

settings.question: HOW LONG IS A SPORT FORMULA TUB GOOD FOR?
settings.answer: Sport Formula is good and shelf-stable for 24 months with the laboratory seal in place. Once you open the container, you must consume it every day until it is gone. once you open the jar, you allow moisture from the air to enter the jar and the moisture affects all of the powder. The powder will become compromised by the moisture. So you will want to take it every day until gone. Take it while it is fresh. The alternative is to buy the single-serving packets which stay fresh until you use them because they are sealed individually. When we blend and packaged are nutrients, we use a dehumidifier environment to remove moisture from the air in order to keep the powder stable and to keep it from degrading and losing potency.

settings.question: HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN BUSINESS?
settings.answer: Sport Formula was incorporated in 2003, but we have been making and selling Sport Formula since 1999.

settings.question: WHERE IS THE BEST PLACE TO BUY SPORT FORMULA?
settings.answer: Our website is the best place to buy Sport Formula, when you place an order it goes directly into the shipping departments software and automatically processes the order and send it to you. it is the fastest and easiest way to get Sport Formula delivered to you by using your cell phone to order it on our website, or you could call our 800-964-8482 phone number.

settings.question: DO YOU OFFER ANY DEALS ON SPORT FORMULA?
settings.answer: Yes we do offer deals on Sport Formula. If you sign up for auto shipments, you save 10% and get free shipping which is a really good deal. And we have various offers for bundled products that make it even more convenient for you to take Sport Formula all the time And save you money too.

settings.question: WHAT IS THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN THE CAPSULE VERSION AND THE POWDER VERSION OF SPORT FORMULA?
settings.answer: Sport Formula in capsules and powder share the exact same powder formula. The difference is that the powder and the jars and the packets have flavoring which make it taste nice and the capsules do not. The capsules are raw vitamins minerals and other nutrient without flavoring.

settings.question: HOW MANY CALORIES ARE IN SPORT FORMULA?
settings.answer: There are four calories per serving in Sport Formula, that is less than 1 carb.

settings.question: HOW MANY CARBS ARE IN SPORT FORMULA?
settings.answer: There is less than 1 carb and Sport Formula and it equals 4 calories per serving.

settings.question: WHAT IS USP STANDARD?
settings.answer: USP is United States Pharmacopoeia standard. This is the standard that the FDA requires drug manufacturers to use for sourcing their ingredients. It means that the ingredients are tested for potency and purity. this is the only standard that is recognized by the FDA. It is not required for a dietary supplement company or a food company to use this standard of ingredients when making a product. Sport Formula uses the standard because it is the highest quality available. And we only use the best ingredients making our products.

settings.question: ARE THERE STIMULANTS IN SPORT FORMULA?
settings.answer: There are no stimulants in Sport Formula. However, people do report that they have more energy. This is attributed to the fact that raw nutrients are essential for the metabolism of calories and carbs into energy instead of storing them as fat. When your metabolism works, you naturally have more energy and feel good.

settings.question: DOES SPORT FORMULA SPOIL?
settings.answer: Sport Formula can spoil if it is mishandled and allowed to get wet and left in the heat. That combination will ruin the product. So please keep it dry and cool with the lid tight and stored out of direct sunlight but do not store it in the fridge because that will create condensation inside of the jar.

settings.question: ARE THERE SIDE EFFECTS TO SPORT FORMULA?
settings.answer: Yes, positive side effects like good health and better sleep and more energy and a sense of well-being with mental focus and enhance stamina and quicker recovery from fatigue.

settings.question: WHAT ARE ESSENTIAL AMINO ACIDS?
settings.answer: Essential amino acids are the ones that your body cannot make out of itself. Let me explain, your body can make 40000 amino acids at will by removing body tissue and recreating amino acids into the amino acids that it needs to repair another part of your body. This is an amazing thing that your body can do. but as amazing as this is, your body cannot make the nine essential amino acids from itself. You must get essential amino acids from outside of your body in food or Sport Formula. and what do they do? This can be explained by saying what essential amino acids are used for. One example is they are used in chromosome production which intern are used in hormone production by the pituitary glands which make growth hormone estrogen testosterone and all the hormones. They are needed to keep you young.

settings.question: CAN YOU TAKE SPORT FORMULA AS A PRENATAL?
settings.answer: Absolutely, it is the ultimate fresh raw source of nutrients and far superior to any tablet form, just add 400 to 800 MCG of folate or folic acid during pregnancy. make sure it is USP standard as well.Absolutely, it is the ultimate fresh raw source of nutrients and far superior to any tablet form, just add 400 to 800 MCG of folate or folic acid during pregnancy. make sure it is USP standard as well.

settings.question: CAN YOU TAKE SPORT FORMULA WHILE NURSING?
settings.answer: Absolutely, yes again. as the child nurses, the mother's nutrients are given to the child. Sport Formula is everything missing in food and will replenish the mother. it is the ultimate fresh raw nutrient that you need to stay healthy while you nurse your baby. There are no stimulants or toxins in Sport Formula, there are only wonderful Raw fresh cold process nutrients with live enzyme function to complete your body chemistry.

settings.question: CAN I TAKE SPORT FORMULA VITAMINS MORE THAN ONCE A DAY?
settings.answer: Yes! The best way to take Sport Formula vitamins is multiple times daily.Perhaps you work out a lot and need more recovery nutrients. Maybe you had surgery and want to heal quicker. For most people it is about providing the nutrients your body needs to fight off or reduce the severity of sickness.

settings.question: IS THE PRODUCT COLD PRESSED OR COLD PROCESSED AND COULD YOU EXPLAIN THIS PROCEDURE TO ME?
settings.answer:
All of our products are cold processed.

The greens are cold processed. This means that heat was never used in the nutrient extraction process. Cold extraction is a more time consuming and expensive procedure and does not disturb the quality of the nutrient being extracted from the source material like heat extraction would of.

Everything we use in our blends are USP standard (United States Pharmacopeia Standard) just like a drug and meet the FDA requirements for the manufacturing of a drug, which we do not make drugs. We just use that standard of ingredients because it maintains the live enzyme function, or the life passing quality of the nutrient just as it was in the source material it was extracted from.

All this means is that when you take the greens blend or any Sport Formula supplement, you are getting cold processed and live nutrients that your body is raving and is able to absorb and fully use to enhance your metabolism and bodily functions like recovery and immune health etc.

settings.banner_title: New, Fun, Natural Way, To Burn Fat

settings.title_one: The Top 3 Fat Burning Foods & How To Burn Fat With Them
settings.content_one:
As you read every word of this blog post, you will begin to understand one of the little known secrets of how to use high fiber vegetables to burn your fat off for good by eating smarter not working harder.

The 3 principles you need to understand to have amazing success are:

1) You must burn or use more calories than you consume if you expect to use your fat reserves for an energy source.

2) Your body will conserve fat if you don’t eat enough or often enough. So starving doesn’t work, you’ll need raw vitamins.

3) You must keep eating but the food has got to be low in calories, high in fiber and hard to digest. This and raw vitamins together keep your metabolism going so you can use up your fat reserves.

Instead of eating a high calorie meal, eat high fiber vegetables to keep your appetite under control and keep your metabolism going.

Your stomach will be full whether you eat a double cheese burger fries and soda (2500 calories) or if you eat entire bunch of celery stalks (negative 10 to 100 calories). The cheese burger fries and soda will overload you with calories that you can’t use fast enough so you store fat. The celery will actually use more calories for digestion than it provides and burn calories like doing cardio without actually doing any.

Let’s Put Your Calorie Intake Into Perspective:

1) It takes 1 hour of strenuous cardio to burn just 500 calories off.

2) A cheese burger, fries and a soda take 5 hours of cardio to burn off.

The idea here is that your body can only use a certain amount of calories at one time and then you will store the rest as fat. That is why the above cheese burger fries and soda makes you fat. It’s not more calories than you can use in one day, it’s just more than you can use in one meal or several hours. Your body is able to digest and convert the calories to be used as energy faster than your body can actually use them as energy, so the extra is stored as fat.

Another big problem with the cheese burger fries and soda is that all the ingredients have been heat processed to kill bacteria and extend the shelf life, which kills the raw vitamins. Raw, unheated vitamins convert carbs and stored body fats into energy. So if your food has no fresh raw vitamins, you’ll be storing fat instead of making energy.

So Take Sport Formula RAW Powder Vitamins To Get Faster Results.
settings.title_two: They Are Finally Revealed! The Top 3 Fat Burning Foods are:
settings.content_two:
All non-sweet vegetables work similarly but these listed above are the top 3 at low calorie and high fiber content. Eat as much as you want, but don’t defeat the purpose with dressings that are high in calories and full of high fructose corn syrup and MSG. Use seasonings, or oil and vinegar...

WARNING: These low calorie foods, not only create a calorie deficit but can leave you vitamin deficient as well. And one of the biggest problems in food these days is the lack of fresh, raw, live vitamins to burn fat with. That is what raw vitamins do, among other things, is convert stored fats into energy. That’s right; you can speed up the fat burning process by consuming Sport Formula’s Fresh, Raw, Cold Processed RAW Vitamins, Minerals, And Amino Acids Daily.

The real Secret is fresh RAW powder vitamins that are essential for converting calories into energy instead of storing them as fat.

“Eat your vegetables raw, cook them and you lose something”

What you are losing are the RAW vitamins! You need RAW vitamins to convert calories into energy. And without RAW vitamins, you store calories into fat and feel tired, even though you ate the empty calories.

That’s why heat processed food like milk makes you fat...

The vitamins have been cooked out.

Pasteurized Means: Has Empty Calories That Store As Fat!

That is why we suggest using Sport Formula Fresh, Raw, and Cold Processed, Powder Vitamins that dissolve 100% without upsetting your stomach, Burning Your Fat and Building Your Muscles naturally...

“If vitamins are heated, they do nothing for you at all”

Sport Formula is cold processed to burn fat and it builds your muscles.

You feel better about yourself every time you take it...You get faster results with less effort, it’s a BOOST!

settings.content_one:
Our late founder, Cindy Joseph, spent 27 years as a makeup artist. With her unique insight into bringing out women's beauty (at EVERY age), she created our original Boom cosmetics and skincare line. "As women age, looking fresh rather than made up is the key," Cindy said.

“The biggest makeup mistake that middle-aged women make is putting on too much under-eye concealer,” Cindy said. “At home, it might look okay, but in the daylight, it just looks like a bunch of gunk under your eyes. The older you get, the less makeup you should wear. It’s not a blank canvas anymore.”
settings.content_two:
Long before Cindy founded BOOM!, she had two very successful careers—first as a makeup artist, and then as a silver-haired supermodel.

Cindy began her career as a makeup artist in late-1970s San Francisco. Working for Macy's, Esprit and others, she pioneered the "natural look" with her models—which later became the inspiration for Boom cosmetics.

Soon after Cindy let her silver hair grow in, she was spotted on a New York sidewalk by fashion photographer Steven Meisel's scout. At 49, she began her second career as a silver-haired supermodel. During the next two decades, she was featured in ads for Dolce & Gabbana, DKNY, Olay, Nivea, L.L. Bean, Target and more.

Having spent nearly three decades as a makeup artist and another two as a supermodel, Cindy decided—in her early 60s—to go into the cosmetics business herself. She wanted to design a line of cosmetics that was all about revealing, embracing and celebrating women's natural beauty at every age. We are proud to say that she succeeded...and BOOM! was born. Today, Boomstick Trio is still our customer favorite, creating the dewy natural look ideal for all skin types and tones at all ages.

Cindy's legacy lives on in all of us here at BOOM!, as well as hundreds of thousands of women worldwide who resonate with her pro-age philosophy.
